tool_description: API showing a live feed of news articles about Crypto
name: Crypto News Feed
title: Crypto News Feed

api_list.name: Crypto News Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto News Source Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return only the articles from a specific source

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Only articles with titles including the search terms will be returned

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit the amount of returned articles

api_list.name: Crypto News Feed
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the most recent articles from all sources

optional_parameters.name: sources
optional_parameters.description:
Array of news sources to filter on.
Only articles from the selected sources will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: exclude
optional_parameters.description:
Array of news sources to exclude.
All articles but the ones from these sources will be returned

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit the amount of returned articles

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Only articles with titles including the search terms will be returned
